title: A compendious or briefe examination of certayne ordinary complaints of diuers of our country men in these our dayes which although they are in some part vniust & friuolous, yet are they all by vvay of dialogues throughly debated & discussed. By William Stafford, gentleman.
author: Hales, John, d. 1571, attributed name. aut
publisher: In Fleetstreate, neere vnto Saincte Dunstones Church, by Thomas Marshe,
